text: Average response time not displayed in statistics section HTML report(feature of 3.0). it is giving 90% 95% but not average.Some times client ask average response time and unfortunately it is not there in report. Please let me know if it can added/enable through changes in properties files.
creator: khushalwadake@gmail.com
support@ubikloadpack.com
text:
It has been implemented in Bug 59954
You can try nightly build if you don't want to wait for 3.1
